net.librec.util

Class ZeroSetter

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.librec.util.ZeroSetter

  • public class ZeroSetter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class sets vector or matrix or tensor to zero
    Author:
    bin wu (wubin@gs.zzu.edu.cn)
